#summary Build Dependency

==To build you need:==

 * java 1.5 / java 1.6 since r177
 * [http://ant.apache.org/ apache ant] 1.7 and upper
 * [http://subversion.tigris.org/ svn command line] 1.4 and upper
 * temenos connector client (tcclient) installed
 * set environment variable TC.HOME
 * [http://logging.apache.org/ log4j] (included in T24 TCClinet libraries)
